ygData.subject: Who runs faster? (Was:RE: Binding or not...)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... My understanding is that Spirit of Norrath IS the guide movement spell.  So if the Shadowed Men have it as well then a Guide/GM *could* out run them if
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Binding or not...
>Date: Mon, 4 Oct 1999 11:20:03 -0600
>
> > I thought that SoN was equal to a 35th lvl bard with
> > MM battledrums? Or is this bad info?
>
>Spirit of Norrath is the fastest moving enchantment
>in the game. Just ask the next 50th level bard that
>tries to outrun the shadowed men. (Who have Spirit
>of Norrath) Even the guides/GM can't outrun them;
>it's been tested.

My understanding is that Spirit of Norrath IS the guide movement spell. So
if the Shadowed Men have it as well then a Guide/GM *could* out run them if
she/he had a head start :p

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
